item.title: Lets PK v2! | 634+ Items & characters | 508 gameframe | 100% Pking & skilling
item.dc:creator: @choiboy3 choiboy3
item.description:
@choiboy3 wrote:

Ehh not really because they are “fun” items for looks and designs and no one would really but it with cash. Plus on many servers people buy “votes” so they can get vote points which can easily cause scamming, but we have vote tickets which allows no scamming.

Read full topic
